title: El increible cuerpo humano
description:
In English

DOCUMENTARY DATA

Original title: The Incredible Human Body

Production Year: 2002

For:: National Geographic TV

Synopsis: Cutting-edge medical technology and riveting, life-or-death personal dramas combine in this unprecedented, emotionally compelling exploration of The Incredible Human Body.

- Marvel at the revolutionary imaging system used to guide a surgeon&#039;s scalpel in a delicate brain tumor operation.

- Witness a childless couple fight to beat the odds and create a new life- with a micro-technological assist.

- See how London cabbies are sending modern brain development theories on an unexpected detour.

An astonishing journey inside bodies of real people, right down to their stem cells, this is the amazing insides story of the human machine as you&#039;ve never seen it before!


DVD DATA

Information: DVD-5.

 Run time: Approx. 60 mins.

Video [System and Region Code]: PAL Multizone.

Languages and audios: English and Spanish Dolby Digital 2.0.

Subtitles: Spanish.

 Screen format: 4:3 or Standard 1.33:1 Color


METHOD OF RIPPED

Source: DVD5

Format: DVD5 Untouched.

Compression: None. Ripped with DVDFab Decrypter.
